Package de.oth.blocklib.renderer

Class MasterRenderer

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.renderer.MasterRenderer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Renderer, DoubleBuffer
public class MasterRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Renderer
Renderer for all Renderable objects. Register all objects that should be rendered with draw(Renderable) Register all additional light sources with addLight(Light) Delegates rendering to UIRenderer,OpaqueMasterRenderer and TransparentMasterRenderer
Author:
edit: Tobias Werner WiSe17/18, edit: Sven Kalle SoSe2018, edit: Loher Florian WiSe21/22
See Also:
ShaderProgram, Renderable

    private java.util.List<Light> lights  
    private LightViewMatrix lightViewMatrix  
    private java.lang.Runnable nextSetUniforms
    Used to asynchronously set global uniforms as the values need to be synchronised to the simulation but the execution needs to be on the render thread
    private OpaqueMasterRenderer opaqueMasterRenderer  
    private CreatorQueue<RenderedRenderable> renderableCache
    a ring buffer to reuse RenderedRenderable objects. objects are retrieved from renderable Cache and then move -> usedRenderables -> lastUsedRenderables -> cache usedRenderables and lastUsedRenderables are also used as a double buffer, so only the references change and the objects are not actually moved
    private java.lang.Runnable setUniforms
    Used to asynchronously set global uniforms as the values need to be synchronised to the simulation but the execution needs to be on the render thread

    private TransparentMasterRenderer transparentMasterRenderer  
    private UIRenderer ui  
    private java.util.Queue<RenderedRenderable> usedRenderables

    • nextSetUniforms

      private java.lang.Runnable nextSetUniforms
      Used to asynchronously set global uniforms as the values need to be synchronised to the simulation but the execution needs to be on the render thread

    • setUniforms

      private java.lang.Runnable setUniforms
      Used to asynchronously set global uniforms as the values need to be synchronised to the simulation but the execution needs to be on the render thread

    • renderableCache

      private CreatorQueue<RenderedRenderable> renderableCache
      a ring buffer to reuse RenderedRenderable objects. objects are retrieved from renderable Cache and then move -> usedRenderables -> lastUsedRenderables -> cache usedRenderables and lastUsedRenderables are also used as a double buffer, so only the references change and the objects are not actually moved

    • lastUsedRenderables

      private java.util.Queue<RenderedRenderable> lastUsedRenderables
